## Chihara & Hesterberg 2nd Edition

These datafiles come from Chihara, L. and Hesterberg, T. (2018). [_Mathematical Statistics with Resampling and R, 2nd Edition_](https://sites.google.com/site/chiharahesterberg/home). New Jersey: John Wiley & Sons. They are available in the `resampledata` package.

    # to load a dataset
    library(resampledata)
    data(FlightDelays)
